title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Formative Assessment and Peer Review Skills for Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate a draft mathematics instructional design against peer review criteria with 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify three or more instructional design errors in peers' work using a feedback-structured rubric.
Learners can submit revised drafts incorporating formative assessment results within 24 hours.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
